subject: RE: [junit] Testing XML and XSLT
msgSnippet: We have a different implementation for this, We built a class that compares two DOM objects after being cleaned by nekohtml. This is because when you do a
messageBody:
We have a different implementation for this,

We built a class that compares two DOM objects after being cleaned by
nekohtml.

This is because when you do a strict file comparison things like this won't
pass even though they are essentially equivalent.

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0"> !=
<table cellpadding="0" width="100%" cellspacing="0" border="0">
